markdown:
**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 110 2.0 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4) **Spell Lists** [Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5) **Deities** [Ayrzul](/Deities.aspx?ID=102), [Ragdya](/Deities.aspx?ID=194), [Ragdya](/Deities.aspx?ID=194), [Yamatsumi](/Deities.aspx?ID=185) **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Area** 15-foot cone **Saving Throw** Reflex --- You create a wave of energy that ripples through the earth. Terrestrial creatures in the affected area must attempt a Reflex save to avoid stumbling as the shockwave shakes the ground. **Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until the start of its next turn.
**Failure** The creature falls [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).
**Critical Failure** As failure, plus the creature takes 1d6 damage. --- **Heightened (+1)** The area increases by 5 feet (to a 20-foot cone at 2nd level, and so on).
name: Shockwave

summary: You create a wave of energy that ripples through the earth.
summary_markdown: You create a wave of energy that ripples through the earth.
text: Shockwave Source Gods & Magic pg. 110 2.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Spell Lists Elemental Deities Ayrzul, Ragdya, Ragdya, Yamatsumi Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Area 15-foot cone Saving Throw Reflex --- You create a wave of energy that ripples through the earth. Terrestrial creatures in the affected area must attempt a Reflex save to avoid stumbling as the shockwave shakes the ground. Critical Success The creature is unaffected. Success The creature is flat-footed until the start of its next turn. Failure The creature falls prone. Critical Failure As failure, plus the creature takes 1d6 damage. --- Heightened (+1) The area increases by 5 feet (to a 20-foot cone at 2nd level, and so on).
